item.title: AsciiDoc Test
item.description: Title Two Title Three Title Four Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of their party. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. Rubies are red, Topazes are blue. Rubies are red, Topazes are blue. Code highlighting [1] # here is some bash using markdown if [ -x /usr/bin/asciidoctor ] ; then echo Found it! fi Now using asciidoc formatting [2]
